      • dataModulusAdd

        private byte[] dataModulusAdd​(byte[] data,
                              byte[] module)
        A method to do modulus add to two byte arrays. that is: result = data + module. if data is longer than module, reuse module for several times until data meets the end.
        i.e. data = {0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0}, module = {2, 3, 4} than result = {2, 3, 4, 2, 3, 4, 2}

        i.e.2 data = {0, 0, 0}, module = {1, 2, 3, 4, 5} than result = {1, 2, 3}
        参数:
        data - byte array which seen as the first part of modulus addition.
        module - byte array which seen as the second part of modulus addition.
